summary: This bill, H.R. 5459, aims to amend the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946. It primarily focuses on changing the timing of the Congressional summer adjournment. Specifically, it proposes moving the adjournment date to June 30th instead of July 31st and adjusting related dates in August and September. The changes are slated to take effect at the start of the second session of the 119th Congress.
